@apaszke I can send a PR for this, I took a quick look and seems like all that is needed is to add the following to torch.manual_seed()

if torch.cuda.is_available:
    torch.cuda.manual_seed_all(seed)

However I noticed the torch.cuda.manual_seed* functions don't return a generator, whereas torch.manual_seed does. Is there a reason for this?
